byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and AL BAKER

abstract: Staten Island Judge William E Garnett hears arguments for release of testimony, evidence and other materials related to grand jury trial of Daniel Pantaleo, police officer acquitted in choking death of Eric Garner; advocates argue that particulars of case call for transparency and bypassing of laws preventing release of grand jury materials.
lead_paragraph: Five groups are seeking the release of testimony before a grand jury that did not indict an officer in the chokehold death of a Staten Island man in July.

headline.main: Judge Hears Case Over Release of Garner Grand Jury Materials
headline.print_headline: Judge Hears Case Over Release of Garner Grand Jury Materials

snippet: Five groups are seeking the release of testimony before a grand jury that did not indict an officer in the chokehold death of a Staten Island man in July.
